actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committees.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

official_title: Congratulating the College of Saint Catherine in Saint Paul, Minnesota, on its centennial anniversary, and commending its outstanding contributions to the education and preparation of women as leaders of our communities, our families, and our nation.

summary.text:
Recognizes the College of St. Catherine's, in St. Paul, Minnesota, for its 100 years of service and continuing commitment to the education of women.

Commends the College's President, alumni association, Board of Trustees, and founding order, the Sisters of St. Joseph Carondelet.

titles.title: Congratulating the College of Saint Catherine in Saint Paul, Minnesota, on its centennial anniversary, and commending its outstanding contributions to the education and preparation of women as leaders of our communities, our families, and our nation.
